data.title: Two Doors Down series 7: Everything we know so far
data.meta_description: From how to watch, where it's filmed and the cast, here is everything you need to know about Two Doors Down on the BBC as it returns for series 7.
data.text:
This comes after filming started earlier in June when the show's producer Jacqueline Sinclair announced the news with a picture of stars Elaine C Smith, Arabella Weir and Alex Norton on Twitter.

With the show's return only weeks away and many eager to see how Glasgow couple Eric and Beth Baird handle their nosey neighbours, here is everything you need to know.

Is Two Doors Down coming back for 2023?

Two Doors Down is returning in 2023 and is expected to air on BBC One later this year, as confirmed by the broadcaster.

The previous series aired in November of 2022 with this expected to be the case for series 7.

How many episodes will there be in series 7 of Two Doors Down?

The series is set to have six episodes with each lasting around 30 minutes.

Where is Two Doors Down filmed?

Previously, much of Two Doors Down (including the exterior shots and scenes) was filmed in the Glasgow suburb of Bishopbriggs on Bowmont Hill but this has since changed.

Episodes from series 4 onwards featuring the fictional street of Latimer Crescent were then filmed on Avonbrae Crescent in Silvertonhill, Hamilton.

Who is starring in series 7 of Two Doors Down?

Here is the main cast expected to appear in series 7 of the show as Cathy (played by Doon Mackichan) returns:

Alex Norton - Eric

Elaine C Smith - Christine

Arabella Weir - Beth

Jonathan Watson - Colin

Jamie Quinn - Ian

Doon Mackichan - Cathy

Kieran Hodgson - Gordon

Graeme Stevely - Alan

Joy McAvoy - Michelle
